name: Breach In Space
description:
Breach In Space is a 2D shooting game with challenging combat and very hard platforming. Find a way back to home galaxy through 4 different planets.

Game Features

  • Destroy monsters with 4 different weapons and 3 different utilities.
  • Upgrade your weapons, character and utilities at the space station.
  • Travel through 4 unique planets to find a way back home.
  • Each planet contains completely different enemies and an epic boss.
  • A classic side-scrolling action with tight 2D controls and very hard platforming.
